Email us to start giving your reviewers recognition. We'll provide you the Authorization and Journal Token(s) needed to complete the next steps.

To enable the plugin fill in the fields below

Once you have enabled the plugin, reviewers will have the option to get recognition for their review on the review submission page.

If the reviewer opts in to get recognition, data will be securely transmitted to Web of Science upon the review's submission. The reviewer will receive an email (at the email address they registered with the journal) containing a link to claim their review.

Reviewers will be asked to log into Web of Science and the review will be added to their account. Reviewers can select "Automatically add reviews from partnered journals" in their Web of Science Researcher Profile settings to eliminate this step.

Web of Science won't publish review content unless both the journal and the reviewer allow it.
